Base:InitialProperties.Base:InitialProperty: "Generic:jewelry:anklet"
"Generic:jewelry:armband"
"Generic:jewelry:bracelet"
"Generic:jewelry:brooch"
"Generic:jewelry:choker"
"Generic:jewelry:circlet"
"Generic:jewelry:earring"
"Generic:jewelry:necklace"
"Generic:jewelry:pin"
"Generic:jewelry:ring"
"Generic:jewelry:tiara"
"Generic:literature:book-jeweling"
"ALL THAT GLITTERS: A Winter Catalog For Jewelers"

"CONTENTS\
\
2. Anklet\
3. Armband\
4. Bracelet\
5. Brooch\
6. Choker\
7. Circlet\
8. Earring\
9. Necklace\
10. Pin\
11. Ring\
12. Tiara\
13. Jeweling Book\
14. Updates\
\
All items offered in this catalog are manufactured in accordance with Guild of Jewelers guidelines, and will accept all standard customization options of Metal, Shape, Design, Stone and Engraving."
"A plain Anklet of highly malleable construction. One size fits all."
"A plain Armband, primed for all standard options. One size fits all."
"A plain Bracelet, eager to accept alterations. One size fits all."
"A plain Brooch, waiting for an artist who can transform it into a masterpiece. One size fits all."
"A plain Choker, poised for greatness. One size fits all."
"A plain Circlet, filled with possibilities. One size fits all."
"A plain Earring, ready for the touch of a genius. One size fits all."
"A plain Necklace with a flexible attitude. One size fits all."
"A plain Pin with \\"Customize Me!\\" written all over it. (Well, not really.) One size fits all."
"A plain Ring with endless potential. One size fits all."
"A plain Tiara with royal aspirations. One size fits all."
"A plain copy of THE ART OF ORNAMENTATION: A Reference For Jewelers. Indispensable reading for students of the craft!"

"UPDATES\
\
New jewelry items are always being commissioned by the Master Jewelers of Castle Marrach. The text of this catalog will mysteriously update itself as new choices become available.\
\
Please bring typographical errors or other textual problems found in this volume to the attention of any StoryHost."
"[An advertisement for the Guild of Jewelers.]"
"[An advertisement for Royal Winter Jewelry Shoppe.]"
